duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and direct porter(s), equipment installation, facilities equipment repair, and preventative maintenance.
Coordinate with outside contractors to perform activities, repairs, preventive maintenance on equipment, and building and grounds appearance.
Purchase and manage all related maintenance supplies including pet stations.
Coordinate with builders regarding site issues and association property damage.
Take personal responsibility for cleanliness of the community, including doing daily walks and inspections.
Coordinate with the landscaping vendor to ensure the grounds are looking their best.
Answer TownSq requests related to amenities, grounds, landscape, and maintenance.

education_certification.credential: Knowledge of general maintenance requirements, OSHA regulations, and safety standards. Valid driver's license and vehicle insurance.
